position.description: [gizmo_position] The position of the sphere, in meters for each axis. Offset from origo of unit.

initial_rotation.description: [gizmo_rotation] The initial orientation on spawned gibs (relative to the root).

radius.description: [gizmo_radius] Radius of the sphere, in meters.

impulse.description: The amount of force applied at the instant the gib is spawned, in Ns (Newton seconds)

rotational_impulse.description: The amount of force applied in rotation at the instant the gib is spawned. in Ns (Newton Seconds)

random_initial_rotation.description: Wether or not the initial rotation of the spawned gib should be completely randomized.
